department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
description: This is an amendment to a previous tender notice. The document attached to this notice contains an important message about the closing time for the purchase,
full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement
#### Request for Proposal (RFP)

---

Project Details
---------------

*        **Solicitation Number:** WS4308482870
*        **Title:** W0125-24WR03 - Learning Services
*        **Reference Number:** WS4308482870-Doc4341899884
*        **Notice Type:** Request for Proposal (RFP)
*        **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding
*        **Procurement Category:** Service (SRV)

Project Overview
----------------

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) on behalf of the Department of National Defense (DND) are seeking proposals from Learning Services Supply Arrangement Holders. This RFP is open only to those who hold a valid supply arrangement for Learning Services E60ZH-2100LS and meet the specified requirements.

Key Dates
----------

*        **Publication Date:** December 07, 2023
*        **Tender Closing Date:** January 31, 2024, 14:00:00 (EST)
*        **Amendment Date:** January 16, 2024

Eligibility
------------

*        The RFP is open to Supply Arrangement Holders who meet the specified requirements, including those who qualify under Tier “2” (= >$3.75M), Ontario Region, Stream 5 Training Delivery and rank as Military Occupation Training – Senior – 1 Resource or Military Occupation Training – Intermediate – 2 Resources.

Evaluation Criteria
-------------------

The evaluation of the proposals will be based on a Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price.

Notice and Contract
-------------------

The notice and contract information can be found on the Ariba Discovery Platform.

Important
----------

*        All bids must be submitted on January 31, 2024, before 14:00:00 (EST).
*        Bids submitted after 14:00:00 (EST) on January 31, 2024 will not be considered.

Contact Information
------------------

Christopher Casale (SPAC/PSPC)
christopher.casale@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

### Contact and Further Information

To submit a proposal or for further information about this RFP, please visit the Ariba Discovery Platform at https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18217274?extsite=MTgyMTcyNzRfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg== and review the
